column3: select fact as raster_value, st_buffer(b.geom, 50, 'endcap=square') from whse.bc_buffered_roads_gr_skey a join whse.all_bc_gr_skey b using (gr_skey)
column5: Raster weight of roads for the province

column3: select p09_riparian as raster_value, st_buffer(b.geom, 50, 'endcap=square') from whse.thlb_proxy_netdown join whse.all_bc_gr_skey b using (gr_skey)
column5: Raster weight of riparian buffers including water features

column3: select paflb as raster_value, st_buffer(b.geom, 50, 'endcap=square') from whse.thlb_proxy_netdown join whse.all_bc_gr_skey b using (gr_skey)
select fmlb as raster_value, st_buffer(b.geom, 50, 'endcap=square') from whse.thlb_proxy_netdown join whse.all_bc_gr_skey b using (gr_skey)
select pthlb_net as raster_value, st_buffer(b.geom, 50, 'endcap=square') from whse.thlb_proxy_netdown join whse.all_bc_gr_skey b using (gr_skey)
select (fact*10000)::int as raster_value, st_buffer(b.geom, 50, 'endcap=square') from whse.bc_buffered_roads_gr_skey a join whse.all_bc_gr_skey b using (gr_skey)
column5: Example of exporting a scaled raster for seles

column3: select (p09_riparian*10000)::int  as raster_value, st_buffer(b.geom, 50, 'endcap=square') from whse.thlb_proxy_netdown join whse.all_bc_gr_skey b using (gr_skey)
select (paflb*10000)::int as raster_value, st_buffer(b.geom, 50, 'endcap=square') from whse.thlb_proxy_netdown join whse.all_bc_gr_skey b using (gr_skey)
select (fmlb*10000)::int as raster_value, st_buffer(b.geom, 50, 'endcap=square') from whse.thlb_proxy_netdown join whse.all_bc_gr_skey b using (gr_skey)
select (pthlb_net*10000)::int as raster_value, st_buffer(b.geom, 50, 'endcap=square') from whse.thlb_proxy_netdown join whse.all_bc_gr_skey b using (gr_skey)
